author: Slidebean
description:
WhatsApp’s “find contacts” feature just exposed 3.5B users.

Researchers bulk searched phone numbers and WhatsApp told them which ones were real.
3.5 BILLION accounts confirmed.
Millions had public photos, names, bios.
Not a hack  just automated convenience.
Great for finding friends.
Great for scammers too.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: A WhatsApp design flaw exposed identity data for 3.5 billion users
